title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 55 - Padded Equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 55 - Padded Equipment

State Regulations
§ 55.1 - Definitions
§ 55.2 - Specifications and requirements for padded instrument panels
§ 55.3 - Specifications and requirements for padded visors and padded visor holders
§ 55.4 - Approval
§ 55.5 - Effective date

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 55

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§215, 382-c, 382-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
